identifying Uninvoiced Shipments
section.para: An uninvoiced shipment is a shipment having one or more uninvoiced Sales Order Line Items. To invoice a Sales Order Line Item, select the Order for billing and specify an Invoice amount for the Item. Once the Invoice is printed and then posted, the selected Line Item will be considered invoiced. To view a list of Uninvoiced Shipments, select the "Uninvoiced Shipments" option.
